متوشلح کیلیفورنیا کے وائٹ ماؤنٹینز میں و: Where is Methuselah located? Methuselah tree location California White Mountains
Methuselah is located in the Inyo National Forest and sits in a remote area between California's Sierra Nevada range and the Nevada border.
Where is Methuselah located? Methuselah tree location California White Mountains

The Methuselah Trail is located in the Ancient Bristlecone Pine Forest in the White Mountains in the Inyo National Forest, northeast of Bishop. From the trail you will see the oldest Great Basin Bristlecone pine – Methuselah. Features: Methuselah is more than 4,840 years old.
